sense.name: formally revise or alter a document
sense.examples: They were urged to amend the law to prevent another oil tanker disaster. In line 20, 'men' should be amended to 'people'. It is technically unconstitutional and cannot be enacted until the constitution is amended. The publisher has amended the manuscript in a futile attempt to avoid threatened lawsuits.

sense.name: enrich the soil by mixing organic matter or sand
sense.examples: The secret is to amend the soil to improve its tilth. She amended the garden over a large area using compost.
